description: On the table in 15 minutes, this flavour-packed Chinese barbecue pork fried rice will truly hit the spot. Whip up this quick char siu pork bowl for dinner.
keywords: Quick Chinese BBQ Pork Fried Rice
name: Quick Chinese BBQ Pork Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 560 g Woolworths COOK Chinese BBQ style pork with char siu sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in shredded pork. Spoon fried rice into bowls. Top with egg and remaining onion.
